page.title: 17CHILWELL. Development.
page.content: We know that the village of Chilwell had grown quite considerably by the 1700's - the village was mostly invoved with farming. This continued to be the case until the late 19th century,when the village expanded rapidly but it was still separate from Beeston and Nottingham. In this century Chilwell expanded to provide for the housing needs for the people of Nottingham. Building started in the 1920's and continued until the late 1970's. Now Chilwell is a dormitory area with most people working in Beeston, Long Eaton or Nottingham.
